languages.text: "Начать процедуру благословенного заряжания главного калибра. Боевая тревога на всех палубах — мы идем в бой".
"Main gun deck, commence the blessed ritual of loading. All decks, begin combat preparations. We are giving battle."
languages.original_text: "Начать процедуру благословенного заряжания главного калибра. Боевая тревога на всех палубах — мы идем в бой".

traits.locale_text: "Begin the blessed main calibre loading procedure. Combat alert to all decks, we are giving a fight."
"Begin the blessed main calibre loading procedure. Combat alert to all decks, we are giving a fight."
"Begin the blessed ritual of loading the main calibre. Combat alert to all decks, we are giving battle."
"Begin the blessed ritual of loading the main calibre. Combat alert to all decks, we are giving battle."
"Main gun deck, commence the blessed ritual of loading. All decks, begin combat preparations. We are giving battle."

languages.text: “主炮甲板，开始执行神圣仪式，装填炮弹。各甲板做好准备，我们要开战了。”
languages.original_text: "Main gun deck, commence the blessed ritual of loading. All decks, begin combat preparations. We are giving battle."

traits.locale_text: “主炮甲板，开始执行神圣仪式，装填炮弹。各甲板做好准备，我们要开战了。”

languages.text: « Pont-batterie principal, commencez le rituel de chargement sacré. À tous les membres d'équipage, préparez-vous à en découdre. Nous allons donner l'assaut. »
languages.original_text: "Main gun deck, commence the blessed ritual of loading. All decks, begin combat preparations. We are giving battle."

traits.locale_text: « Pont-batterie principal, commencez le rituel de chargement sacré. À tous les membres d'équipage, préparez-vous à en découdre. Nous allons donner l'assaut. »

languages.text: "Hauptgeschützdeck, beginnt mit dem gesegneten Ritual des Ladens. Alle Decks, Gefechtsvorbereitung. Wir kämpfen."
languages.original_text: "Main gun deck, commence the blessed ritual of loading. All decks, begin combat preparations. We are giving battle."

traits.locale_text: "Hauptgeschützdeck, beginnt mit dem gesegneten Ritual des Ladens. Alle Decks, Gefechtsvorbereitung. Wir kämpfen."

languages.text: «Cubierta de armas principal, comiencen el bendito ritual de carga. Todas las cubiertas a sus puestos de combate. Lucharemos».
languages.original_text: "Main gun deck, commence the blessed ritual of loading. All decks, begin combat preparations. We are giving battle."

traits.locale_text: «Cubierta de armas principal, comiencen el bendito ritual de carga. Todas las cubiertas a sus puestos de combate. Lucharemos».

languages.text: 「主砲甲板、装填の儀式を開始せよ。全デッキ、戦闘準備開始。戦闘を開始する」
languages.original_text: "Main gun deck, commence the blessed ritual of loading. All decks, begin combat preparations. We are giving battle."

traits.locale_text: 「主砲甲板、装填の儀式を開始せよ。全デッキ、戦闘準備開始。戦闘を開始する」

languages.text: "Ana silah güvertesi, mukaddes yükleme törenine başlayın. Tüm güverteler, çatışmaya hazırlanın. Savaşacağız!"
languages.original_text: "Main gun deck, commence the blessed ritual of loading. All decks, begin combat preparations. We are giving battle."
